descriptions.affordable: Offers financial aid to make therapy more accessible for individuals in need.
descriptions.default: Online therapy platform connecting users with licensed therapists for personalized mental health support.
Connects users with licensed therapists through an app, offering messaging and video sessions for flexible support.
Telehealth service offering mental health counseling from licensed professionals, available via video calls.

descriptions.language: (Supports English and Spanish) Text 'HELLO' or 'HOLA' to 741741 for 24/7 support via text.
descriptions.affordable: Provides free 24/7 support through text for those in crisis. Text 'HELLO' to 741741 to connect.
descriptions.default: 24/7 crisis support through text for individuals in need, with multilingual options.

descriptions.affordable: Free, confidential 24/7 helpline offering treatment referrals and information for substance abuse and mental health issues.
descriptions.default: Provides free and confidential 24/7 treatment referrals and mental health information across the U.S.
A meditation app with guided sessions designed to help reduce stress and improve mindfulness.
An app offering guided meditations, sleep aids, and mindfulness exercises to promote relaxation and mental clarity.
App providing tools and strategies to manage anxiety and depression, with therapy and peer support options.

descriptions.language: Supports multiple languages including English, Spanish, and French for emotional support via chat.
descriptions.affordable: Offers free access to trained volunteer listeners for emotional support, along with therapy options.
descriptions.default: Online support platform connecting individuals with trained listeners and licensed therapists.
A supportive online community on Reddit where individuals can share experiences and seek advice for managing anxiety.
Nonprofit organization providing resources, education, and support for individuals managing anxiety and depression.
Mental health charity offering information, resources, and support for individuals dealing with anxiety and depression.
A 24/7 hotline providing free and confidential support for individuals in distress or experiencing suicidal thoughts.
Offers online chat-based support for individuals dealing with depression or emotional distress.
Mental health app that combines mood tracking with AI-driven therapeutic conversations to support emotional well-being.

descriptions.language: (Supports over 100 languages) Provides global access to online and in-person recovery meetings for alcohol addiction.
descriptions.default: Community-based support group offering help and resources for individuals recovering from alcohol addiction.

descriptions.language: (Supports English, Spanish, and several other languages) Offers self-help resources and group support.
descriptions.affordable: Provides free online support groups focusing on science-based recovery techniques.
descriptions.default: Science-based addiction recovery program emphasizing empowerment and self-management.

descriptions.language: Supports English, Spanish, and Portuguese speakers.

Resources and articles on the process of grief and loss.

descriptions.affordable: Offers affordable therapy sessions with a flat fee between $30-$60.

descriptions.language: Supports Spanish, French, and several other languages through an international network.

Mood tracking app that helps users manage depression and build better habits.
Support groups and resources for individuals managing depression.
Therapy focused on helping individuals cope with grief and loss.

An online community for individuals experiencing grief.
Research and information on drug addiction and abuse prevention.
App for connecting with a sober community and tracking recovery progress.
Addiction treatment and recovery programs tailored to individuals' needs.
Articles and guides on mental health topics, including anxiety and depression.

descriptions.language: Supports users searching for multilingual therapists globally.

name: National Asian American Pacific Islander Mental Health Association (NAAPIMHA)*

descriptions.language: Offers resources in several Asian languages, supporting mental health needs of the AAPI community.
descriptions.default: Advocates for mental health resources and support for the Asian American and Pacific Islander community.
